channel.title: Graphics Request please! <3
channel.description:
Hello, i'm not sure if requesting gfx work, is only aloud for Rsps, but i need a gfx for youtube.
Basically, i'm starting a new series on youtube, and i just need some writing on a black background or something, something that looks pretty cool. Here is the kind of thing that i want: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2u4shfq.png[/img]
^ something like that, but better, and obviously differn't writing, if you think you can do this for me, that'd be awesome, if you can do this for me, i'll tell you the writing what too put in it. I don't care about the colours ect, just want it to look cool. ^_^ So yeah. <3

item.title: Graphics Request please! <3
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

Dunder Mifflin:

Can you elaborate specifically where you want the text, what size in pixels, etc. If so I can help you out, old friend

Hey dude, i don’t really know what the size is lol.

But the text i want is:

Warning:
If you’re easily offended, then don’t watch.
This is all for abit of fun.
I don’t Dislike these people.

thats about it lol.
